articles.title: This ‘90s parenting trend is back — and NY moms and dads are divided - New York Post
articles.description: Some say it just doesn’t make sense in New York City.
articles.content:
Low-rise jeans and Abercrombie & Fitch aren’t the only divisive ’90s trends making a comeback.
Nostalgic moms and dads are eschewing back-to-back day camps and enrichment programs for their kids… [+4766 chars]
